name: Pistols at Dawn
description:
"Scoundrels have besmirched the honor of Flanders Von Picadouley. Following a scrumptious dinner at Flanders’ estate, Mr. Picadouley's guests proposed an innocent game of Drop the Handkerchief, to which the host gleefully obliged. However, much to Flanders’ dismay, the guests had rigged the game! This did enrage Mr. Picadouley, and thus he challenged them to a duel – every last foul and ungrateful smell-feast. The instruments of choice? … PISTOLS AT DAWN."

Made by Horse Honey Games as part of Global Game Jam 2022 (theme: duality)

Credits: 

Corey Waite Arnold (production and design)

Devon Arnold (design)

Anders Carlson (art + design)

Chris McCole (programming + design)

Michael Hudak (music)
